name: Bungle Bounce
description:
Bungle around as you try to bounce for as long as you can while avoiding the hostile enemies floating around on balloons and the dreaded bottom feeder! Featuring randomly generating foliage, lots of particles that you can touch, and a variety of unlockable game modes and items.

This game was designed for mobile, but works fine on PCs. PCs without touchscreens can use the left/right arrow keys to move, or A and D.

*Mac version was never tested

**Update 1.3:
Removed black bars in favor of stretching
Added fading hints at the start of each game
